    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15539</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Capitali dell Unione Europea</string>
            <string language="en">EU Capitals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">EU Kapitalien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Capitaux d'EU</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Capitais do EU</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κεφάλαια της ΕΕ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Capitales del EU</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Una semplice ma interessante risorsa sulle capitali dell'Unione Europea, realizzata con Excel.</string>
            <string language="en">A simple but interesting learning object about the capitals of the European Union, created in Excel.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">capitali</string>
            <string language="en">capitals</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine einfache aber interessante erlernennachricht 
über die Kapitalien des europäischen Anschlußes, innen erstellt 
übertreffen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un objet d'étude simple mais intéressant au 
sujet des capitaux de l'union européenne, créés dedans excellent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um objeto de aprendizagem simples mas interessando
sobre os capitais da união européia, criados dentro excel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα απλό αλλά ενδιαφέρον αντικείμενο εκμάθησης για 
τα κεφάλαια της Ευρωπαϊκής Ένωσης, που δημιουργούνται σε 
Excel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un objeto que aprende simple pero interesante 
sobre los capitales de la unión europea, creados adentro sobresale.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kapitalien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">capitaux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">capitais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κεφάλαια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">capitales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
